## isASTAwareReporterDefinition() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Type guard to check if a reporter definition is AST-aware.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isASTAwareReporterDefinition(def: BaseReporterDefinition | ASTAwareReporterDefinition): def is ASTAwareReporterDefinition;
```
